name: part_007
file: tmp_≪DREAMCATCHER 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday Celebration 2024! #BaeDay2024 [TQSikoeVXoE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz and Tokoyami Towa perform a duet of 'Deichu ni Saku' (Blooming in the Mud).
scenes.song_name: 泥中に咲く (Blooming in the Mud)

scenes.description: Animated sequence showing Baelz preparing backstage, with voiceover.
Hakos Baelz performs her original song 'BOOM' on stage with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: その暗い手で
subtitles.english: With those dark hands

subtitles.original: みんな別々の行き先を食べてる
subtitles.english: Everyone is consuming different destinations

subtitles.original: さあ君も今人間で　その姿が
subtitles.english: Now you, too, are human, and just because

subtitles.original: 嫌いなだけで
subtitles.english: you hate that form

subtitles.original: 憎めないよ　優しいから
subtitles.english: I can't hate you, because you're kind

subtitles.original: 君は誰のために物願うと
subtitles.english: For whom do you make your prayers?

subtitles.original: 一片の羽が散るために
subtitles.english: In order for a single feather to fall

subtitles.original: 水も土も光もその形も
subtitles.english: The water, the soil, the light, and that shape, too

subtitles.original: 僕の目の前にあるものが
subtitles.english: The things right before my eyes

subtitles.original: その意味も過去も未来も
subtitles.english: Their meaning, their past, and their future

subtitles.original: ひと時とかけろ止まれないで
subtitles.english: Gamble on a single moment, don't stop

subtitles.original: 僕も君もあの人も
subtitles.english: Me, you, and that person too

subtitles.original: 何でもないと言いながら
subtitles.english: While saying it's nothing

subtitles.original: 心に重を君に背負わせる
subtitles.english: Making you carry the weight in your heart

subtitles.original: 運命が通せんぼする
subtitles.english: Fate is blocking the way

subtitles.original: 間違い　自業自得だよ
subtitles.english: It's a mistake, you brought it on yourself

subtitles.original: でも状況が良くないからね
subtitles.english: But the situation isn't good

subtitles.original: 逃げたいよね
subtitles.english: You want to run away, right?

subtitles.original: 生きたいよね
subtitles.english: You want to live, right?

subtitles.original: この体を投げ出すその瞬間が　あるとすれば
subtitles.english: If there's a moment to throw this body away

subtitles.original: この世の闇切り裂いてさ　ここに生まれた意味を探そうか
subtitles.english: Tear through the darkness and find our purpose

subtitles.original: 終わりの始まり　始まれば最後さ　人生だから
subtitles.english: The start of the end, once begun it's the finish

subtitles.original: どうしようもない飛び出す背に　今しかない時があるのだろう
subtitles.english: On that leaping back, there is a moment only now

subtitles.original: 雨に溺れることなんてさ　それほどないな
subtitles.english: Drowning in the rain doesn't happen much

subtitles.original: それでもなんだか息苦しいな
subtitles.english: Even so, it feels somewhat suffocating

subtitles.original: いつか死ぬために生きてるなんて
subtitles.english: Living just so we can die someday

subtitles.original: それならさ　それならば
subtitles.english: If that's the case, if that's so

subtitles.original: 壊れない　壊れない　壊れない
subtitles.english: Unbreakable, unbreakable, unbreakable

subtitles.original: 心の鐘を鳴らそう
subtitles.english: Let's ring the bell of our hearts

subtitles.original: 曇天だろう　泥まみれさ
subtitles.english: A cloudy sky, covered in mud

subtitles.original: どこもかしこも
subtitles.english: Everywhere and anywhere

subtitles.original: 今この世の行方を遮る迷路に　線を引こうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's draw a line through this world's maze

subtitles.original: その線がさ　重なる地図
subtitles.english: That line becomes our overlapping map

subtitles.original: 君を照らすために咲く花さ
subtitles.english: The flower blooming to light your way

subtitles.original: A DREAM
subtitles.english: A DREAM

subtitles.original: Bae, you're on in five.
subtitles.english: Bae, you're on in five.

subtitles.original: Never did she think she would be living out her wildest dream.
subtitles.english: Never did she think she would be living out her wildest dream.

subtitles.original: Good Luck!
subtitles.english: Good Luck!

subtitles.original: BOOM
subtitles.english: BOOM

subtitles.original: I come at just in time
subtitles.english: I come at just in time

subtitles.original: Look what I got tonight
subtitles.english: Look what I got tonight

subtitles.original: 帳の降りた大路に　狂騒に集いな　午前二時は
subtitles.english: On the dark road, gather in the frenzy at 2 AM

subtitles.original: Dangerous stuff その瞬間に
subtitles.english: Dangerous stuff, at that very moment

subtitles.original: そのまず感覚　教えられないや
subtitles.english: That first sensation, I can't teach it to you

subtitles.original: Greetings, buddy!
subtitles.english: Greetings, buddy!

subtitles.original: One verse, 揺り動かすよ　見慣れた街並みを
subtitles.english: One verse, I'll shake up these familiar streets

subtitles.original: 風を切る加速を　こちらサイドバックへ
subtitles.english: Acceleration cutting through the wind, right here

subtitles.original: Delicious, begin now　瞳を逸らすなよ Brother
subtitles.english: Delicious, begin now, don't look away, Brother

subtitles.original: 正気じゃいられないね
subtitles.english: You can't stay sane

subtitles.original: Step the step, gotta down, 派手に行こう
subtitles.english: Step the step, gotta down, let's go flashy

subtitles.original: 助手席に座れよ
subtitles.english: Take a seat in the passenger side

subtitles.original: 心拍数が上がって止まらない
subtitles.english: My heart rate is rising and it won't stop

subtitles.original: 火をつけたように　Never feel lucky
subtitles.english: Like it's on fire, never feel lucky

subtitles.english: This dancer here is the best
